thread.title: After the snow comes the mist for UAE
thread.title_full: After the snow comes the mist for UAE

title: After the snow comes the mist for UAE

organizations.name: national centre of meteorology and seismology

text:
After the snow comes the mist for UAE Web Team /Dubai Filed on February 5, 2017 | Last updated on February 5, 2017 at 12.35 pm Share 
File photo The NCMS has warned of fog formations taking place around the country After a spell with snow that has amazed residents making a rush for the mountains, UAE's weather is now back to its regular agenda - that being cloudy and windy. The National Centre of Meteorology and Seismology (NCMS) has reported that fog and mist formations are expected to show up in certain areas of the country thus care when driving is a must. Also, temperatures will see a slight rise today and this is coupled with a gradual rise in humidity that will increase throughout the day. Humidity will reach its peak levels in the wee hours of Monday morning. Today's expected weather from 08:00 this morning till 08:00 tomorrow, we wish you a pleasant day. pic.twitter.com/vcZN6Zck3y - UAE WEATHER (@NCMS_media) February 5, 2017 Earlier, the lowest recorded temperature was in Jebel Jais which the NCMS recorded to be at -2.9Â°C at 12:00 midnight. There has been no confirmation by the institution whether the mountain will see continued snowfall this week. - UAE WEATHER (@NCMS_media) February 4, 2017
